item.title: The schedule of the NBA Trophy Tour featuring Coach Erik Spoelstra presented by...
item.description:
The schedule of the NBA Trophy Tour featuring Coach Erik Spoelstra presented by Gatorade is as follows:

SAT, Aug.4
SM North EDSA The Block Atrium 2:00 - 3:00 pm

SUN, Aug.5
SM Megamall 2:30 - 3:30 pm
SM MOA Music Hall 4:30 - 5:30 pm

item.title: Happy Saturday hoops fans! While we'd like you guys to enjoy your paychecks, don...
item.description: Happy Saturday hoops fans! While we'd like you guys to enjoy your paychecks, don't forget to chime in and check out our awesome contests. First off, it's the last day for our Coach Spo fan Q&A. Post your question after the link and get a chance to win a Coach Spo autographed ball! Chosen questions will be answered by the Heat Coach live via Ustream on ph.nba.com on August 2. So click and ask away! http://www.facebook.com/notes/nba-philippines/coach-spo-fan-qa-contest/448086875222717
item.author: NBA Philippines
item.dc:creator: NBA Philippines

item.description:
Coach Spo Interactive Viewing Party Poll Contest
The NBA Finals maybe over, but with Coach Erik Spoelstra visiting the Philippines once more, we couldn’t resist holding an interactive NBA Finals viewing party at the Mall of Asia. ...

item.title: Wassup Pinoy NBA fans! Even if you’re not a fan of the Heat, you’d be hard press...
item.description: Wassup Pinoy NBA fans! Even if you’re not a fan of the Heat, you’d be hard pressed not to like Coach Erik Spoelstra. He’s the only NBA coach with Filipino blood to win the championship. He’s also a true son of the Philippines, supporting our country in any way he can. Which is why he’s coming back this August, and you have the chance to ask him what you’ve always wanted to know. Join the Coach Spo Fan Q&A Contest now, and you may even win an autographed ball. Post your question after the link!http://www.facebook.com/notes/nba-philippines/coach-spo-fan-qa-contest/448086875222717
item.author: NBA Philippines
item.dc:creator: NBA Philippines
